title: Welcoming new pathways to  GFiE Life Chance Recruitment

content.text: In Going Forward into Employment (GFiE) we develop, run and support life chance recruitment pathways across the civil service. In fact we’ve been helping departments and agencies recruit talented people across the UK and NI since 2018 - that’s seven years and definitely something we will celebrate this year!
But first - we have other exciting news we want to share. We have three new schemes joining the GFiE Recruitment Pathway.
With the GFiE pathways, the civil service leads the way as an employer, signalling what is possible when you collaborate to make a difference.

You can find a full list of currently accredited pathways (including for carers, veterans, care experienced people, autistic people and people from low SEB backgrounds) at Civil Service Careers GFiE Pathways page.
